ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Update accounts TSP information
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Update accounts TSP information
ActivityMetadata.Description: Update information of the Telephony Service Provider set up on an account. **Prerequisites**: TSP account option should be enabled. **Scopes:** `tsp:write:admin` `tsp:write`
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Zoom

Update account's TSP information

Update information of the Telephony Service Provider set up on an account. **Prerequisites**: TSP account option should be enabled. **Scopes:** `tsp:write:admin` `tsp:write`

Method: Patch

OperationID: tspUpdate

EndPoint:

/tsp
